law.catch_line: Reward for adoption of books forbidden.
law.text: No person shall secure or attempt to secure the adoption of any school textbook in any school district in this state, by rewarding or promising to reward, directly or indirectly, any person in any public school district in the state. No person shall offer or give any emolument to any person in any school district in this state for any vote or promise to vote, or the use of his influence, for any school textbook to be used in this state.
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. IV, sec. 160, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 184, sec. 14.
